item.description:
Join others from Boston Small Business Success Network to meet with other small business owners who work in healthcare to discuss shared challenges.

This is a participant-driven event in unconference format for people who work in the healthcare who:

  • Have a problem you are trying to solve in Healthcare but donâ€™t know how to solve the problem.
  • Want to change something in Healthcare and needs other healthcare professionals input.
  • Have an idea and want to get it validated by other.
  • Want to teach other about your expertise.

Practical Details

Full details available on event website www.painpointsinhealthcare.com

Kendall Square stop on the MBTA red line.

Cost and How to Register

The event is free.

Register here or click the yellow Register Now button to reserve your spot.

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.
item.name: Pain Points for Health Care Businesses
